E1-1.data_point: Transition Plan for Climate Change Mitigation — Net-zero/GHG neutrality target year: 2040 (full value chain); interim milestones: Scope 1+2 and Scope 3 Cat.6+7 GHG neutral by 2025; Scope 3 upstream supply chain GHG neutral by 2030; Scope 3 downstream product use GHG neutral by 2040. SBTi-approved near-term gross reduction targets (base year 2019): Scope 1+2 -90% by 2040; Scope 3 intensity per gross profit -97% by 2040. Internal carbon price: €200/tCO2e (2024), indexed +4%/year. Total CapEx committed to green transition: not explicitly quantified in the data provided. EU Taxonomy-aligned CapEx %: not explicitly stated in the data provided. Specific EU Taxonomy activities: not listed in the data provided. Note: ASML states it is not excluded from EU Paris-aligned benchmarks (DR16g).
E1-1.disclosed_value: GHG neutrality target year: 2040 (value chain); 2025 (Scope 1, 2, and Scope 3 Cat. 6 & 7); 2030 (Scope 3 upstream Cat. 1, 2, 4); Scope 1+2 gross reduction target: -90% vs. 2019 base year; Scope 3 intensity reduction target: -97% vs. 2019 base year; Internal carbon price: €200/tCO2e (2024), +4%/year indexation; CapEx committed to green transition: null; EU Taxonomy-aligned CapEx %: null

E1-5.data_point: Energy Consumption and Mix — Total annual energy consumption: not explicitly disclosed as a standalone consolidated figure in the data provided. NXE energy use per wafer pass: 5.9 kWh (2024 actual; 2025 target: 5.1 kWh). Renewable energy percentage: not explicitly stated as a total mix percentage in the data provided. Breakdown by source (natural gas, electricity, on-site renewables in MWh): not provided in the data provided. Year-on-year energy intensity change: not explicitly stated as a percentage in the data provided; however NXE energy use per wafer pass of 5.9 kWh is disclosed against a 2025 target of 5.1 kWh.
E1-5.disclosed_value: NXE energy use per wafer pass: 5.9 kWh (2024, NXE:3800E); 2025 target: 5.1 kWh; Total energy consumption (MWh/GWh): null; Renewable energy %: null; Natural gas (MWh): null; Grid electricity (MWh): null; On-site renewables (MWh): null; YoY energy intensity change (%): null

E1-6.data_point: Gross GHG Emissions — Scope 1+2 combined: 32.8 kt CO2e (2024); Scope 3 total: 12.0 Mt CO2e (2024). Scope 3 categories disclosed: Cat. 1 (purchased goods & services), Cat. 2 (capital goods implied), Cat. 4 (upstream transportation/logistics), Cat. 6 (business travel), Cat. 7 (employee commuting), Cat. 11 (use of sold products) — explicitly named in the transition plan and compensation framework; smaller categories (fuel- and energy-related activities, waste in operations, end-of-life treatment) acknowledged as <0.1% of total Scope 3. Scope 2 market-based: not separately disclosed in the data provided. Scope 2 location-based: not separately disclosed in the data provided. Scope 1 standalone: not separately disclosed in the data provided (only combined Scope 1+2 = 32.8 kt CO2e). GHG intensity: Scope 3 intensity = 0.83 kt CO2e per €m gross profit (2024); 2025 target: 0.93 kt CO2e per €m gross profit. Base year: 2019.
E1-6.disclosed_value: Scope 1+2 combined gross emissions: 32.8 kt CO2e (2024); Scope 3 total gross emissions: 12.0 Mt CO2e (2024); Scope 1 standalone: null; Scope 2 market-based: null; Scope 2 location-based: null; Scope 3 categories disclosed: Cat. 1, Cat. 2 (implied), Cat. 4, Cat. 6, Cat. 7, Cat. 11 (explicitly named); GHG intensity (Scope 3): 0.83 kt CO2e per €m gross profit; Base year: 2019
E1-6.unit: tCO2e / kt CO2e / Mt CO2e / kt CO2e per EUR million gross profit
